Activity: Arrive at the hospital, log in to the system, and check emails. Address any feedback received from @clinlead-1 Nadia Silva and @his-1 regarding yesterday's summary.
Participate in a training session led by the Training Coordinator @trainer-1 on best practices for EHR documentation and data integrity.
Begin patient assessments and EHR documentation, focusing on influenza symptoms. Implement the new best practices learned during the training session.
Review data on patients who tested positive for Influenza, discuss patient care management with @rn-1.
Continue patient assessments and EHR documentation. Collaborate with colleagues to ensure consistency in data entry practices.
Audit EHR documentation to identify areas for improvement and develop strategies for enhancing data quality.
Prepare a final summary of patient encounters for the week, highlighting key trends and insights. Send summary to Clinical Lead @clinlead-1 Nadia Silva and Health Informatics Specialist @his-1.
